dialogue.text: I tap on Sana’s name in my phone and wait for her to answer.
It’s not something I do often. But it’s something (among many things) that I’d like to change about my life going forward.

Not {i}just{/i} because I’m curious about how her insides feel, though. It’s because something has changed in her that can’t be quantified or clarified by the amount of sex we will have in the future.
No matter how hard we try.
Hello?
Which I’m sure will be very hard based on the current level of our respective libidos.
Hey. What are you up to right now?
I was...about to go to work...
Are you coming tonight?
Is there any chance you could just...{i}not{/i} go to work?
Is...uhh...
Do you...need me for something?
Possibly.
May I...ask what it is?...
What do you {i}want{/i} it to be?
Let me call you right back.
Sana hangs up the phone, giving me the opportunity to reach into my pants and make several much-needed adjustments that will prevent passersby from swarming me and seizing my body for their own use.
I quickly undo the adjustments I made because that sounds fun and so far I’ve only had sex with people I know.
Hello?
I told my mom I’m not feeling well.
Awesome. Now I have someone to go to that brand new all-you-can-eat spaghetti buffet with.
Let me call her back again and tell her I’m okay now.
Damn. I was also planning on breaking in my new mattress afterward, but I guess I can just find someone else to help me with that part.
Can we just...skip the spaghetti thing and go straight to that?
I {i}guess.{/i} How soon can you be at my place?
Uh...twenty minutes? Should I...bring anything?
What would you even bring?
I actually...don’t know.
No secret lingerie collection you’ve been hiding from everyone?
I could...bring one of my old Halloween costumes?
On second thought, I think I’m just going to go to the spaghetti buffet alone and call it an early night.
I’ll come empty-handed! I promise!
Sa-
No backing out! Goodbye!
Sana hangs up the phone and I make my way back to the house.
After a worrying amount of pacing and some reflection on the damage I inflicted upon Miku the last time I stuck my dick in something way too small, the doorbell rings.
I may be about to break another vagina.
{i}Oh.{/i}
Well hi, Akira. I love you too.
I didn’t realize you were going to be home so early.
Is it a {i}problem{/i} that I am home so early?
Uhh-
Oh. I {i}see.{/i}
Uhh...
Are you going to answer that?
It’s probably just a package.
{i}Sensei...are you...are you home yet?{/i}
I order all of my packages under the name “Sensei.” I’m sure you understand.
Why is a presumably teenage girl visiting you right now? And why did you need to be alone for it?
I-
You?
...started tutoring again?
Is that so?
Yes. That is the only reason a girl her age would have to come see me while Ami is not home.
That's great, babe!
Surely you won’t mind if I watch then, right?
Uhh...
{i}Should I...come back another time?...{/i}
Great! I’m glad you agree. Let me run to the restroom and I’ll be right back to supervi- ahem. I’ll be right back to {i}watch{/i} you!
Niki-
Nope! No red flags at all! Just another normal day at the Arakawa house!
{i}Where my totally normal boyfriend gets visits from totally normal girls who are totally here to learn! How fun!{/i}
{i}Maybe the doorbell is just...broken?{/i}
Come in, Sana. It’s fine.
Hey...I think your doorbell is-
The doorbell’s fine. But there’s been a change of plans.
If you’re nervous about it being my first time, don’t be. I want you to hurt me.
That’s not what I-
What?
You can go as hard as you want without having to worry about my safety. I can handle it.
Sana, I need to tutor you.
You sure do, Sensei.
No, I mean I literally need to tutor you.
Why do you only exist to hurt me in the ways I do not {i}want{/i} to be hurt?
Listen, it’s not my fault. Niki came home early and now she probably thinks you came over here to have sex with me.
She’s right. I {i}did{/i} come over here to have sex with you.
Yes, but she {i}can’t{/i} know that because it puts our relationship in jeopardy.
She doesn’t know about you yet?! How?! Everyone and their mother knows! Does she live under a-
{i}Sana, keep your voice down. Please.{/i}
Sorry, I just...I thought I was one of the last ones and...I kind of assumed everybody else was just being...blissfully ignorant?...

I’m sure she {i}is{/i} being blissfully ignorant. But I would like her to {i}keep{/i} being blissfully ignorant as there is a level of {i}bliss{/i} involved that would quickly dissipate if she encountered me fucking a girl your size.
So it would be okay if I was taller?
No. By size I meant age. I just try to omit or disguise that when possible because it makes me feel gross.
That’s the best part, though.
{i}What happened to you?{/i}
Puberty is a violent beast, Sensei. Only you can tame me.
God, you’re so hot now.
Would it help convince her if we let her join us?
Okaaaay! Ready to finally witness you at {i}work,{/i} babe! Can’t wait to see how excellent and smart you are!
{i}What if we just tied her up and threw her in the closet or something?{/i}
{i}How horny are you right now?{/i}
{i}Very! And it’s all your fault! Now I have to learn?!{/i}
{i}Just...pick a topic and we’ll bullshit our way out of it. I’ll make it up to you next time.{/i}
{i}Literature!{/i}
{i}Really? Why that?{/i}
{i}Because I know you’ll fuck up everything else!{/i}
{i}I don’t think I’ve ever been more attracted to you before.{/i}
{i}Thanks! I covered my eye again because I thought it would turn you on!{/i}
Akiraaaaa! You’re not {i}fraternizing{/i} in there, are you?
No, Niki. I was just giving Sana the rundown on our tutoring session for today.
Aaaahhh. {i}Sana.{/i} I’ve seen you around here before. How long have you been taking “lessons” from this doofus?
Since...a couple Halloweens ago...but I kind of forced it on him since I...{i}really{/i} want to learn and...no one else is as...{i}smart...{/i}
Right now, all I can really say is that Sana is lucky Niki is here because I would be wreaking havoc upon her if that was not the case.
Ooooooh?...
You sound skeptical, Niki.

I {i}am{/i} skeptical, Akira. You’ve been acting very suspicious lately. And between all of your “dates” and Ami’s entire...existence, I’m starting to worry you might be treading a very {i}risky{/i} and {i}dangerous{/i} path.
I’m confused...I...
If you think I’m...attracted to Sensei at all, I...
Actually think he’s...kind of gross and...way too old...
Is that so?...
Even if it’s not...that was a little rude, don’t you think?
Oh! S-Sorry! I just...I’ve never really...thought about you like that before and...
It kind of...creeped me out a little...hearing you...suggest that maybe he’s been...looking at me...differently...
If Akira’s not your type...what {i}is,{/i} Sana?
May I interrupt and just ask, “what does any of this have to do with tutoring?”
You may, but I’m not going to answer. I have to vet this girl to make sure she isn’t just lying to me. So stay quiet and be good and I’ll give you a treat later.
Me?...Or...are you talking about-
Akira, obviously. The kind of treat I’m talking about isn’t exactly something I can share with teenage girls.
That’s...a shame because...you’re actually...a lot closer to my type than he is...
Oh?
I’m actually...not interested in boys at all...and...
I didn’t really know that until recently, but...I’ve always liked...more feminine types and...Sensei is just...
As far from that as they come. I know.
Hey, I’m not {i}as{/i} far from that as they come. I like some feminine things.
Like what? Me? You can’t even buy tampons for your daughter without having an existential crisis.
Okay, but in my defense, I’m almost {i}always{/i} having an existential crisis. So that doesn’t say much.
Can you...please not tell anyone, Sensei?...About me and...how I feel about...you know...
How do you feel about Ami specifically?
Huh?
Is {i}she{/i} your type? Because it’d be super healthy for her to start pining after someone she isn’t literally related to.
Does Ami...even like girls?...
She says she doesn’t, but I feel like it’s a front. And you seem weird and suspicious enough to check off {i}those{/i} boxes she apparently has if she’s into her father.
So, about {i}tutoring...{/i}
I guess if...Ami wanted to, I...I wouldn’t mind...g...going out with her...
I’d...want to move slow, though...so...I don’t know if she’d be...patient enough to...give up on Sensei...
Hmmm...
So, has she been successfully “vetted” yet? Will you leave us alone now?
Sana’s very clearly not comfortable when it comes to speaking and has a harder time absorbing information when there are others present.
It’s...true...Sensei has been helping me with that for...a long time now...
It’s been a...major obstacle for me to...overcome and...and I’m feeling more confident now, but...
I’ll keep my mouth shut and stop asking questions. I’m not going to leave, though.
Niki-
I-It’s fine, Sensei! She can stay! Just...we can pick up where we...left off...in that...one book you like, and...I’ll do my best to...not feel uncomfortable...
And so half an hour goes by as I sit there and bullshit about all I remember from the Lord of the Flies.

Without books or...any actual material to use though, it seems more like the world’s most boring open discussion than actual tutoring. And it’s clear that even Sana’s patience is beginning to wear thin.
Either that or she’s gotten uncomfortable sitting in a puddle of her own creation by now, infinitely waiting for me to put her out of her misery and hurt her how she {i}wants{/i} to be hurt.
In a way, I’m thankful that Niki would take it upon herself to wait here and make sure I {i}don’t{/i} do that.
But in another, much darker way, I’ve moved much closer to Sana’s earlier suggestion about tying her up and throwing her into the closet. {i}Or{/i} letting her join in.
That seems nigh impossible at this point though, if Niki’s trust in me has diminished to the point where she feels uncomfortable just leaving me alone with girls like Sana.
Is that my fault for how I handled Niki’s initial arrival? Probably. But I feel like some of the blame {i}has{/i} to lie with Sana too because of how cute she is.
Creepy, I know. But you’ve gotten used to that by now. Kind of like how Piggy had to get used to dealing with broken glasses until he was ultimately killed by a boulder.
I wonder if that will happen to me?
I wonder if Sana {i}is{/i} the boulder? Because at one point, she {i}was{/i} the image of purity to me. There was no one more angelic than her.
But now, here she is — wholeheartedly embracing a facade I forced upon her all because she wants {i}me{/i} to force myself on {i}her.{/i}
That innocence is gone. She is no longer an angel. She is no longer pure. But it’s quite possible she never {i}was{/i} to begin with.
I just {i}wanted{/i} her to be.
Kind of like how Piggy wanted to not be killed by a boulder.
...and for those reasons, I don’t think Jack was all that bad.
I...agree, Sensei...
And thank you for...summarizing the entire book for me...
It is at this point that I will begin to break down each and every instance of symbolism from the book using nothing but my memory and superior intellect.
Okay. I’m bored.
You two keep doing what you’re doing. I’m going to take a shower.
You’re not worried anymore?

It’s become clear to me that between Sana’s lesbianism and your monologue about a bunch of kids trying to form a civilization that no one here is going to be doing anything inappropriate any time soon.
And also, if I have to listen to you talk about this book for more than another five minutes, I’m going to pass out and miss my dance class tonight.
Oh. Okay. Have fun.
Take...your time...
I’ll be...gone soon anyway...
Niki grabs a change of clothes from {s}my{/s} our bedroom before disappearing into the bathroom and turning on the water.
The sounds of the shower running quickly turn the otherwise silent house into...
They...
Uhh...
The...sounds...
